subject: svn commit: samba r22175 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0/packaging/RHEL: .

===================================================================
--- branches/SAMBA_3_0/packaging/RHEL/samba.spec.tmpl	2007-04-11 12:53:27 UTC (rev 22174)

@@ -149,7 +149,8 @@

 	--with-smbmount \
 	--with-syslog \
-	--with-utmp 
+	--with-utmp \
+	--with-dnsupdate

@@ -390,6 +391,7 @@
